artist: Artist: Jean-Pierre Norblin de la Gourdaine
creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: 3/4 view of man with large eyes, short, thinning hair, and large forehead stares at spectator over PL shoulder; holds tool in PR hand, and a cluster of brushes in PL
provenance: John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie; gave to MIA, 2015. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
signed: signed and dated in plate, upper left: [Norblin fecit  1778]
title: Self-Portrait, Facing Left
